trans-unit.source: Expose <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Udostępnianie <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> typów do automatyzacji interfejsu użytkownika.

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Element skojarzony z tym węzłem równorzędnym automatyzacji.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" /> klasy.

trans-unit.source: An object that is in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obiekt, który znajduje się w <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> skojarzonego z tym <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" /> for the specified item.
trans-unit.target: Tworzy nową <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" /> określonego elementu.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonControlDataAutomationPeer" /> for the specified item.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonControlDataAutomationPeer" /> określonego elementu.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera typ kontrolki dla <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> skojarzonego z tym <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: Ta metoda jest wywoływana przez <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.List" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.List" /> Wartość wyliczenia.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera kolekcję elementów podrzędnych <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> skojarzonego z tym <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.
trans-unit.target: Ta metoda jest wywoływana przez <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.

trans-unit.source: The collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Kolekcja elementów podrzędnych <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> skojarzonego z tym <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the class name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera nazwę klasy <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> skojarzonego z tym <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: Ta metoda jest wywoływana przez <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.

trans-unit.source: "RibbonGallery" in all cases.
trans-unit.target: "RibbonGallery" we wszystkich przypadkach.

trans-unit.source: Gets the text that describes the functionality of the control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera tekst, który zawiera opis funkcji sterowania <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> skojarzonego z tym <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText" />.
trans-unit.target: Ta metoda jest wywoływana przez <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText" />.

trans-unit.source: The text that describes the functionality of the control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Tekst, który zawiera opis funkcji sterowania <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> skojarzonego z tym <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Wyliczenie wartość określająca wzorca formantu.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera wzorzec kontroli <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> skojarzony z <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Selection" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" /> value; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Obiekt, który obsługuje wzorca formantu, jeśli <paramref name="patternInterface" /> jest <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Selection" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, lub <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" /> wartości; w przeciwnym razie <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the UI Automation provider requires at least one child element to be selected.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera wartość, która określa, czy dostawca automatyzacji interfejsu użytkownika wymaga co najmniej jeden element podrzędny, należy wybrać.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" /> we wszystkich przypadkach.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Ten element jest jawną implementacją członków.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Można go używać tylko wtedy, gdy <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer> wystąpienia jest rzutowane na <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interfejsu.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a UI Automation provider for each child element that is selected.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera dostawcę automatyzacji interfejsu użytkownika dla każdego elementu podrzędnego.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> for each child element that is selected.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> Dla każdego elementu podrzędnego.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Ten element jest jawną implementacją członków.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Można go używać tylko wtedy, gdy <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer> wystąpienia jest rzutowane na <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interfejsu.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the UI Automation provider requires at least one child element to be selected.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera wartość, która określa, czy dostawca automatyzacji interfejsu użytkownika wymaga co najmniej jeden element podrzędny, należy wybrać.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.

trans-unit.target: Można go używać tylko wtedy, gdy <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer> wystąpienia jest rzutowane na <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interfejsu.
